recipesJson.name: Pank Milk
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description:
Pink Guava... milk? Yes. The assignment was to take one of two colors - pink or blue - and add them to milk. 

Love that Pink Guava, especially that bit of tropical funk on it. Pink plus stank = Pank. With some Hibiscus - which also tastes pink to me - to bridge the wide gap between grapefruity pank and thick moo juice. None of the usual recipe development here. The first version tasted exactly the way I wanted it to and I couldn't think of a way to improvement. Maybe you can?

reviews.text: This is so very wrong, that I don't ever want to be right again. It's like eating a piece of chocolate wrapped in crispy bacon- you know it's weird, you know you shouldn't, but you just can't stop doing it. I couldn't stop vaping this- it was sweet and tangy and sour and perfectly pink. But still, just so wrong it redefined what "right" is. Amazing.

What damn abomination is this? Why do I like it so much? I don't know what it is with pink guava lately, but there is something to be had here. You and Kocanda with his Dream Haze are making me look at pink guava in a different light. There is a sharpness yet... cream? It's bright yet mellow? You are brain fucking me right now!?!?
